data.description:
Coloring books are a timeless, easy way for adults and kids to have fun making art. But what if you could step into the coloring book? In Color Space you don’t just color in a scene — you color *inside* a scene.
Equipped with a palette and a coloring wand, you’re transported into any of 32 beautiful black-and-white worlds created by a growing group of VR's most talented artists. You fill in the world with as many colors as you like, one tree, rock and flower at a time.  
As you color, the scene comes to life around you. Rivers run, birds fly, planets revolve, meteors shine. The soundscape responds hypnotically as you color, with custom sound and music created by our incredible musicians and sound designers.

Our “Infinite Color” Update: Folks wanted more colors to choose from, including blacks and grays -- you got them!  

*Improved advanced palette with a broader range of tones, including grey and black colors.
*Improved palette buttons to make color selection easier
*Improvements to certain textures for a smoother appearance
*Fix to improve fog appearance in certain scenes

More scenes are coming soon -- stay tuned!
